top: Update your farm profile by editing the text boxes below and clicking Update farm at the bottom of the page
To undo any changes, click Cancel to refresh the page with the existing profile.
After updating, you'll be able to see the changes on the Farm Profiles page
coordinates: Click on the map to set your location, or enter GPS coordinates in the text box below
publish: Unclick the checkbox to hide your profile
To completely delete your profile contact admin
bottom: Update farm will save your changes to the database.
Cancel will wipe all your changes and retrieve the existing farm profile from the database.
add-key-value-pair: To add an additional key-value pair, enter the desired key in the text box and click the link underneath
A key might be e.g. Website while the value might be http://blahblah.com
title: The name of your CSA
images: Add one or more images of your CSA
These will appear in a slideshow on your farm profile page
A random selection also appears on the front page
Add a short caption to images if you like, or leave blank
info: Key-value pairs providing information about the CSA.
If entering a website please put 'http://' or 'https://' at the front as appropriate
description: One or more paragraphs describing the CSA.
Paragraphs are easier to read if kept to around 100 words or less.
